Metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Bad Parenting
Metadata.description: Learn how we protect your privacy in the shadows.

title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: How we protect your secrets in the dark

informationCollection.title: Information Collection
informationCollection.content: We collect your fears, your choices, and every trace you leave in the game. This data will be used to enhance your horror experience.

userAccount.title: User Account
userAccount.content: Your account is like a key to this dark world. Guard it carefully, for once lost, you may never escape.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We use state-of-the-art encryption to protect your data, just as the Red-Faced Man protects his secrets. But remember, in this world, nothing is absolutely safe.

cookieUsage.title: Cookie Usage
cookieUsage.content: We use cookies to track your behavior, much like how the Red-Faced Man tracks disobedient children. These cookies help us provide a more personalized horror experience.

policyUpdate.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdate.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time, just as nightmares can change at any moment. Please check regularly to ensure you understand how we handle your information.
